name: medic
description: SMS data collection designed for rural environments.
long_description: Medic Mobile is a web based SMS data collection and analytics tool focused on community health care workers in rural environments. We help large health organizations collect and analyze data sent from health care workers using ordinary mobile phones.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here.

locales.title: Locales
locales.description: A list of available locales with a unique short code (egs: 'en', 'fr') and a human readable name of the locale (egs: 'English', 'French')

locale.title: Default Locale Code
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here. Must be one of the codes specified in Locales above.

reported_date_format.title: DateTime Format
reported_date_format.description: Format used to display dates and times.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Auto-replies are added to messages received after this date.  If left empty auto-replies are not added.  Use the format YYYY-MM-DD to define the date, for example 2014-03-27.  This setting only applies to unstructured messages, not forms.  Error replies are added when a message is empty or a form is not found and we are in forms only mode.  Otherwise you will get a default reply. All reply messages are generated based on translation and locale settings.

district_admins_access_unallocated_messa.title: Allow District Admins To View Unallocated Messages
district_admins_access_unallocated_messa.description: If ticked, district administrators will be able to view messages with no allocated facility as well as messages from their district.

default_country_code.title: Default Country Code
default_country_code.description: Messages without a country code will be assigned this country code.

replace.title: Replace with
replace.description: The value to replace the match with

outgoing_phone_filters.title: Outgoing Phone Filters
outgoing_phone_filters.description: These filters are applied to every phone number on an outgoing message.  This can be useful if your incoming phone number and outgoing phone number formats are slightly different.

match.title: Match
match.description: A regular expression used to match a phone number.  e.g. \+997

replace.title: Replace with
replace.description: Replace the match with this value.

schedule_morning_hours.title: Scheduled Message Morning Hours
schedule_morning_hours.description: Only send messages on or after this hour.

schedule_morning_minutes.title: Scheduled Message Morning Minutes
schedule_morning_minutes.description: Only send messages on or after this minute.

schedule_evening_hours.title: Scheduled Message Evening Hours
schedule_evening_hours.description: Only send messages on or before this hour.

schedule_evening_minutes.title: Scheduled Message Evening Minutes
schedule_evening_minutes.description: Only send messages on or before this minute.

synthetic_date.title: Synthetic date
synthetic_date.description: Only use this if you are testing message scheduling and want to simulate a specific date. e.g. 201304121200

id_format.title: Patient ID Format
id_format.description: Length of generated numerical identifiers. Note, an extra check digit is always used, so the default value (1111) generates a length of 5.

contact_display_short.title: Short Contact Display
contact_display_short.description: How to render the contact name in short format? e.g. clinic.name, clinic.contact.name, clinic.parent.name

kujua-reporting.title: Scheduled Reports
kujua-reporting.description: The forms to include in reporting rates stats.

condition.title: Condition To Send Alerts
condition.description: Alert will be sent when condition is true. Build condition using the notation `form_code(reports_ago).field_id`. E.g.: The following can be used to send an alert if the value of `s1_avail` in form `STCK` falls below the three month average of `s1_used`: "STCK(0).s1_avail < (STCK(0).s1_used + STCK(1).s1_used + STCK(2).s1_used ) / 3".

message.title: Alert Text
message.description: Text that will be sent out in the alert. Variables names can be used. E.g.: {{clinic.name}}, {{s1_name}}.

recipient.title: Send Alerts To
recipient.description: The email or phone number to receive alerts. Can also use variable name to receive alert. E.g.: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent, name@ngo.org, +15559870000

form.title: Reminder Form Code
form.description: What form is this reminder for?  e.g. ZDIS

text_expression.title: Reminder Text Configuration
text_expression.description: A text expression definition of the schedule.  See http://bunkat.github.io/later/parsers.html#text e.g. at 9am on Monday

cron.title: Reminder Cron Configuration
cron.description: A cron definition of the schedule. Optional, a text expression will override this.  e.g. weekly on Monday at 9am: '0 9 * * 1'

mute_after_form_for.title: Mute Reminders For
mute_after_form_for.description: After receiving a form, how long to mute reminders for.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 5 days

message.title: Reminder Text
message.description: Message to be sent.  The following strings will be substituted into the message: {{week}}, {{year}} and {{form}}.

form.title: Registration Form
form.description: Form code of a registration form. e.g. ANCR

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Available field names for use in validations

help.title: Help
help.description: Instructions explaining how to use this form, including description and form submission examples in Markdown format.
help.default:
Register for this message workflow by sending an SMS with the following format: `ANCR <patientname>`.

For example, to register "Maria Soleil" you would send: `ANCR Maria Soleil`

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: When form is received trigger actions like enrolling in schedule.

params.title: Parameters
params.description: i.e. if assigning a schedule provide the name.

bool_expr.title: Boolean expression
bool_expr.description: If this expression evaluates to false the trigger will be skipped.

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported.

content.title: Message Content
content.default: '{{patient_name}}' is not a valid patient name. Please submit a patient name between 5 and 50 characters.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

form.title: Report Form
form.description: Form code of the report. e.g. ANCV

silence_type.title: Schedule Name
silence_type.description: Name of reminder schedule(s) to clear after receiving this report.  Name needs to match exactly, e.g. ANC Reminders.  If you need to support clearing multiple schedules then separate the names with commas.

silence_for.title: Silence Window
silence_for.description: The length of time used to find the next reminder group to clear.  Leave blank to clear all reminder groups.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 25 days

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Available field names for use in validations

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name to define this schedule. e.g. ANC Reminders

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A brief summary of this schedule

description.title: Description
description.description: A complete description of this schedule in markdown format

start_from.title: Timestamp Property Name
start_from.description: A timestamp or date property on the record that is used to calculate when messages are sent. e.g. lmp_date.  Use reported_date if you want to reference the date and time the report was received.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

group.title: Message Group Number
group.description: You can group reminders together by assigning a group number so they can be cleared in batches.

offset.title: Send Message After
offset.description: This value is added to the timestamp property value to determine when to send the message.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 5 days

send_day.title: Send Day
send_day.description: Optionally specify the nearest day to offset.

send_time.title: Send Time
send_time.description: Specify time of day at which the message is to be sent. Ignored if blank. If timezone offset is not specfiied GMT will be used.  e.g. 20:30 +0300

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

off_form.title: Stop Notifications Form
off_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, stop sending notifications

on_form.title: Resume Notifications Form
on_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, resume sending notifications

confirm_deactivation.title: Confirm Muting Notifications?
confirm_deactivation.description: Disable stopping of notification based on reports, requires administrator action.

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

translations.content: Kituo cha Afya cha Mawasiliano Jina
Le recipient du message n'a pas été trouvé.
No se encontro destinatario para el mensaje.
सन्देश​ पाउने व्यक्ति पत्ता लगाउन असफल।​
फारममा भर्नुपर्ने भन्दा अतिरिक्त कुरा भरिएको।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent '{{form}}' was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas reconnu, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se reconocio el reporte enviado '{{form}}'. Por favor intente de nuevo. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम मिलेन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.

No se encontro a la unidad de salud.
सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य संस्था पत्ता लगाउन असफल।

default.default: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.

translations.content: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.
Nous avons des troubles avec votre message, SVP renvoyer. Si vous continuez à avoir des problèmes contactez votre superviseur.
El mensaje esta en blanco, por favor reenvielo. Si encuentra un problema, informe al director.
सन्देश​ खाली छ​ । कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: Your form submission was received, thank you.

translations.content: Your form submission was received, thank you.
Merci, votre formulaire a été bien reçu.

default.default: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.

translations.content: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.
Merci, votre message a été bien reçu.
Recibimos tu mensaje, lo procesaremos pronto. Si querias mandar un reporte, intentalo nuevamente en el formato adecuado.
सन्देश​ प्राप्त भयो। रिपोर्ट पठाउनुभएको हो भने मिलेन; ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।

default.default: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.

translations.content: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.
Établissement non trouvé, svp corriger et renvoyer
No encontramos a su centro de salud. Por favor corrijalo y reenvie el reporte.
रिपोर्टिङ् युनिटको आइ.डि मिलेन। कृपया ​मिलाएर​  ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।

Nom de la santé Contact Center

default.default: That query is invalid. Read our advanced search help page for more information on query syntax.

translations.content: That query is invalid. Read our advanced search help page for more information on query syntax.

default.default: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

translations.content: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

default.default: You can access the guided tour or the easy setup wizard from the settings icon in the upper right.

translations.content: You can access the guided tour or the easy setup wizard from the settings icon in the upper right.

default.default: You will need a USB GSM modem with an active SIM card to send and receive text messages.

translations.content: You will need a USB GSM modem with an active SIM card to send and receive text messages.

default.default: Select who will be registering and tracking pregnancies in your community.

translations.content: Select who will be registering and tracking pregnancies in your community.

default.default: They will need a mobile phone with a texting plan.

translations.content: They will need a mobile phone with a texting plan.

default.default: If you don't know what to choose, refer to the ANC user guide.

translations.content: If you don't know what to choose, refer to the ANC user guide.

default.default: Select the language that your primary point of contact will be using.

translations.content: Select the language that your primary point of contact will be using.

default.default: If you don't see your language, you can always add a custom language from Administrative Settings.

translations.content: If you don't see your language, you can always add a custom language from Administrative Settings.

default.default: Will your primary point of contact for registration be able to report using Last Menstrual Period (LMP).

translations.content: Will your primary point of contact for registration be able to report using Last Menstrual Period (LMP).

default.default: Women in some cultures may not want to share this information.

translations.content: Women in some cultures may not want to share this information.

default.default: If you don't know what to choose, refer to the ANC user guide.

translations.content: If you don't know what to choose, refer to the ANC user guide.

default.default: You can start a tour at any time by clicking the cog in the top right corner. Which tour would you like to run?

translations.content: You can start a tour at any time by clicking the cog in the top right corner. Which tour would you like to run?

default.default: This is number where mobile reporters should send their reports. It is also the number they will receive messages from.

translations.content: This is number where mobile reporters should send their reports. It is also the number they will receive messages from.

default.default: Messages without a country code will be assigned this country code.

translations.content: Messages without a country code will be assigned this country code.

default.default: There was an error saving your settings, please try again.

translations.content: There was an error saving your settings, please try again.

default.default: Could not retrieve data at this time.

translations.content: Could not retrieve data at this time.

default.default: Here you can communicate with patients, community health workers, and community members to schedule trainings, ask and respond to questions, and provide additional information — just like regular SMS. You can also send bulk messages to groups of people.

translations.content: Here you can communicate with patients, community health workers, and community members to schedule trainings, ask and respond to questions, and provide additional information — just like regular SMS. You can also send bulk messages to groups of people.

default.default: This is a list of all your message contacts with the most recent one on top. The light blue highlight indicates which message is being displayed on the right. If the name is bold it means you haven't read one or more messages with this contact.

translations.content: This is a list of all your message contacts with the most recent one on top. The light blue highlight indicates which message is being displayed on the right. If the name is bold it means you haven't read one or more messages with this contact.

default.default: This pane shows the exchange of messages from the selected health worker or phone number on the left.

translations.content: This pane shows the exchange of messages from the selected health worker or phone number on the left.

default.default: This bar contains the contact's name and phone number on the left, and their location on the right.

translations.content: This bar contains the contact's name and phone number on the left, and their location on the right.

default.default: The blue border indicates an outgoing message sent by you, another user, or an automated message from Medic Mobile.

translations.content: The blue border indicates an outgoing message sent by you, another user, or an automated message from Medic Mobile.

default.default: The yellow border indicates an incoming message sent by the selected contact.

translations.content: The yellow border indicates an incoming message sent by the selected contact.

default.default: Use this box to quickly send an SMS message to the contact.

translations.content: Use this box to quickly send an SMS message to the contact.

default.default: All of the reports submitted by community health workers live here. Depending on how you are using Medic Mobile in your community, these reports may be for pregnancy registrations, completed visits, or stock outs.

translations.content: All of the reports submitted by community health workers live here. Depending on how you are using Medic Mobile in your community, these reports may be for pregnancy registrations, completed visits, or stock outs.

default.default: Select one or more form types to filter the list of reports to only those for the chosen forms.

translations.content: Select one or more form types to filter the list of reports to only those for the chosen forms.

default.default: Select one or more facilities to filter the list of reports to only those from the chosen facilities.

translations.content: Select one or more facilities to filter the list of reports to only those from the chosen facilities.

default.default: To view reports within a specified date range, select a start and ending date.

translations.content: To view reports within a specified date range, select a start and ending date.

default.default: To filter by validity or verification, select one or more options.

translations.content: To filter by validity or verification, select one or more options.

default.default: To add additional search terms type them here and click the search button.

translations.content: To add additional search terms type them here and click the search button.

default.default: This is a list of all your report messages from health workers with the most recent first.

translations.content: This is a list of all your report messages from health workers with the most recent first.

default.default: This icon shows the status of the report. A green circle means the report is valid, and red means invalid. A tick in the circle means someone has verified this report.

translations.content: This icon shows the status of the report. A green circle means the report is valid, and red means invalid. A tick in the circle means someone has verified this report.

default.default: You can see the details of the selected report in this pane.

translations.content: You can see the details of the selected report in this pane.

default.default: On the left hand side is the reporter's details. On the right hand side is the reported date.

translations.content: On the left hand side is the reporter's details. On the right hand side is the reported date.

default.default: The content of the report including the form type, submitted fields, generated fields, and any generated messages.

translations.content: The content of the report including the form type, submitted fields, generated fields, and any generated messages.

default.default: Actions you can perform on this report.

translations.content: Actions you can perform on this report.

default.default: Medic Mobile organizes the data from your reports into charts and graphs to help you track pregnancies, monitor danger signs, and identify trends in your community - so you can make well-informed decisions and take action when it is needed.

translations.content: Medic Mobile organizes the data from your reports into charts and graphs to help you track pregnancies, monitor danger signs, and identify trends in your community - so you can make well-informed decisions and take action when it is needed.

default.default: Here you can customize settings including translations, forms, and other general settings.

translations.content: Here you can customize settings including translations, forms, and other general settings.

default.default: Import and export the available forms.

translations.content: Import and export the available forms.

default.default: Configure the messages that will be generated when a patient is registered.

translations.content: Configure the messages that will be generated when a patient is registered.

default.default: Export messages, reports, or the audit log. The exports are divided into specific districts and can be filtered by date.

translations.content: Export messages, reports, or the audit log. The exports are divided into specific districts and can be filtered by date.

default.default: Here you can create, edit, or delete users.

default.default: Here is where you manage your facilities and field workers.

translations.content: Here is where you manage your facilities and field workers.
